Key:
Rgh... Curse this. Their numbers won't decrease!
How annoying!

You talk big for someone struggling so much.
You should give up already.

Hmph. Do not underestimate us. This is
still just a test! Sandalphon!

She dodged it?! No, am I under some type
of spell?
I see... Not too bright, are you, Princess?

Why can't I land a hit? The space distortions
are getting to me...
Done already? Then, I guess it's my turn.
Ngh! What is this...?! The enemy split!
Hee hee. Prepare for total annihilation.
Aaaaaaugh! ...Rgh!
You survived. I underestimated you.
That attack was nothing!

Your Astral Dress, Adonai Melek, seems
rather sturdy. But, is it only a matter of
time?
Time? What are you...
Ngh... What is this... My body is... heavy?!

Using my copies as intermediaries, I'm
manipulating space and time itself, including
your Astral Dresses and Angels.

Manipulating?! How, I do not understand what
you're saying! All I need to do is avoid you!
If you can. But there's...
A lot of me, you know?

*pant, pant*... Rgh. I cannot move. This is
troubling...
Well, almost time to say good night.
This is bad. At this rate...!
...?! I can't move... Ngh!

Tohka Yatogami. Release your Astral Dress
and Angel at once. Then, manifest them
once more. It should reset you.
Understood. I'll try it!

Ohh, I feel light! Y-You saved me, Origami
Tobiichi.

In order to locate Shido, we must hurry
to eliminate these pests. It was all part of
my mission. I didn't save you.

Hrm. I see. Still, I thank you. Being saved by
you is irritating, but if we don't stop them
now, Shido will be in danger.
Goodness. How bothersome.

If it is to protect Shido, I have no choice but
to support Tohka Yatogami.

Rgh, I cannot stomach you! But we will survive
this together, Origami Tobiichi!
I know that without you needing to tell me.

Hee hee. There's no way you can hurt me
without your equipmen—
Why do you think we can't?
Wha? Rgh!

All I need to do is attack, make simple
adjustments, and we will gain the upper
hand.
What do you mean, Origami Tobiichi?

This world is not a normal digital world.
It is the Artificial Spirit's Territory.

If it is casting Territory through the Realizer,
then I am versed in its capabilities.
Hm, I see... So what does that mean?

The reason your attacks aren't landing is
because space itself is being manipulated.
I can nullify that.
I see! Which means...
That's right.
If we work together—
We can win.
You think it'll be that easy?!
Wha, I'm surrounded!
I see. It's completely different than earlier.

The enemy's numbers are greater. We must
annihilate them with the fullest extent of our
ability. And leave no trace.
I understand. Leave it to me!
Rgh. I won't allow it!
I won't let you.

You telegraph your movements too much.
Your pathetic attempts make it easy to counter.
It can't be... Am I... going to lose...?

Consider us the superior opponents.
Besides, I... am only trying to buy time.

This is the end! Sandalphon... Halvanhelev!
EAAAAT THIIIIIIIIS!
